text_block_list.text: One day in February, I was working as usual when――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Knock, knock! Excuse me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And once again, excuse me!
…… I wonder what that was.
(knocknocknocknocknock!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san!? Why aren't you following me!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Come on, let's go!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushinbakushiiiin!!
Not knowing what to expect, I followed her to the park, and found……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, please, take this!
She handed me a pretty package. What on earth is this…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Happy Valentine's Day, Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Why are you surprised!?
choice_data_list: Do you even know what Valentine's Day is?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Naturally! It's the day to give chocolate to those who have been good to us!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Every year, my classmates bring in a variety of sweets and we have a blast!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Similarly, I've received a lot of sweets, too! I'm quite popular, aren't I!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Maybe!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ahem! Well, that's all well and good!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: However, I'm the class president! It's a no-go to take the initiative to hand out candy on campus!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So I, using my brilliant mind, have decided that as long as it's off campus, it's OK!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So, I tried my hand at making some chocolates!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Of course! Homemade is exemplary for these kinds of things, right?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I demonstrated such superior cooking ability to my home economics teacher that she said,"I'll give you credit for the class, just don't do anything else!"

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Well, in the end I managed to remove the debris and beat out the chunks of chocolate, so you can eat it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm not exactly used to Valentine's Day, but…… I reaaaaally wanted to give this to you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Because Trainer-san is the one who helped me achieve my dream.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I still understand this much. I know how big my dream is.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But I also know that with my superior speed, there's no way I can't make it come true.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But truthfully, you were the only person outside of my family who understood.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What am I saying! Fufu, you already understand, don't you, Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Anyways, please enjoy this token of my gratitude!
I really appreciate her sentiment, but I can't help but feel a little embarrassed when I have to reiterate my trust in her…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Indubitably, I do!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Are you sure!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I see, a reverse Valentine's Day! Then, I'd love to go, Bakushin-style!!
Afterwards, I took her to a restaurant that served chocolate fondue, and was relieved to see her looking quite satisfied.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Come on, come on, right here, right now!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Of course! Take a bite and let me hear you say "Mmm, that's delicious"!
…As expected…. I'll have to eat it right here, right now….!
(Crunch….munch, crunch)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ohh! It's got the perfect crunch! How about the taste?
… Tires? Tires, dirt, a hint of grass? At any rate, it has a very unique taste that can't be called chocolate…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Is that so!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Naturally, I knew it would be delicious since I was the one making it, but truthfully, I was a little worried.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm not as good at cooking as I am at running, but it still turned out delicious. Is that so…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, I'm so glad!
I was able to see that smile. That alone made for a great Valentine's Day…… I… think.
